Package cat.nyaa.nyaacore.database.relational

Interface Query<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the table class
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SynchronizedQuery, SynchronizedQuery.NonTransactionalQuery, SynchronizedQuery.TransactionalQuery
    public interface Query<T>
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A simple interface to build the SQL string. Use getConnection() if you need anything complex.
